Author: vvadym
Title: ðŸ“¢[ANN] ðŸ”´Solve.Care - Healthcare on BlockchainðŸ”´TOKEN SALE IS STARTEDðŸš€ðŸŒŽ
Body: Solve.Care is a decentralized and distributed platform for administration of healthcare and benefits programs. The platform addresses the core need of coordinating all parties and communicating all relevant events and circumstances by using a decentralized approach that delivers all relevant information and conditions to the right party exactly when needed.  The platform consists of Care.Wallet, Care.Marketplace, Care.Coin, Care.Vault, Care.Card and Care.Protocol that offer a highly innovative approach to administering benefits and keeping all parties in sync without the need for a centralized record keeper.  Here is the illustration how platform works:  Care.Coin is an intelligent healthcare digital coin designed for transparent, accurate and verifiable payment of healthcare services between members of a care administration network. So, naturally, Care.Coin is going to be used as a unified payment for all the parties of the platform: â€¢ Care.Coin understands relationships â€¢ Brings accountability to healthcare billings â€¢ Handles long lifecycle of healthcare transactions â€¢ Implements proof-of-service â€¢ Easy audit, reconciliation, adjustment & recovery â€¢ Fights fraud, waste and abuse that fiat can not

Author: vvadym
Title: ðŸ“¢[ANN] ðŸ”´Solve.Care - Healthcare on BlockchainðŸ”´TOKEN SALE IS STARTEDðŸš€ðŸŒŽ
Body: Thanks a lot!  Administrative and health information technology costs are high around the world. IT systems that run the growing number of administrative functions continue to become more cumbersome and costly.  There are numerous documented facts that show the current health information technology infrastructure has become less interoperable and unable to deal with the increased demand by both providers and consumers of health care services. All these factors lead to an increasing share of total health care spend being allocated to core administrative functions.  Thatâ€™s where Solve.Care comes in as a solution to many of the problems associated with health care administration and the wide range of functions required to administer health benefits in a seamless and cost effective manner with greater efficiency.

Author: vvadym
Title: ðŸ“¢[ANN] ðŸ”´Solve.Care - Healthcare on BlockchainðŸ”´TOKEN SALE IS STARTEDðŸš€ðŸŒŽ
Body: We are developing our Healthcare Information Architecture on Blockchain (HCIA-BC) as a multi-tier data architecture with several key data tiers such as:   - consent - this tier needs to have high-degree transparency and is used for compliance, audit and ownership and privacy of data - events - the heart of Care.Protocol and stores all events between doctor and patient, doctor and insurance, patient and insurance etc. - content - is responsible for storing (and aggregating) administrative, financial and clinical data. The content can be local or remote   Based on this hierarchy we can deploy appropriate Blockchain with desired properties, for different data tiers. To your question about retrieval times, we allow clients to set Service Level Agreements (SLA) for data retrieval and enforce the SLA via appropriate topology of the Care Admininistration Network. Also please note that HCIA-BC will be published to verified members of Care.Community so they can extend the HCIA-BC architecture and extend the Care.Protocol.
